In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

 

The liquid emission is mazi. It is impure. The private part as well as the undergarments soiled with mazi should be washed.
It is bidah to kiss ones thumbs when hearing the azaan.
